    • validateDimensions

      public boolean validateDimensions(String game, int rows, int columns) throws RuntimeException
      Validates the given dimensions for the given puzzle
      Parameters:
      game - name of the puzzle
      rows - the number of rows on the board
      columns - the number of columns on the board
      Returns:
      true if it is possible to create a board for the given game with the given number of rows and columns, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if any of the given input is invalid

    • validateTextInput

      public boolean validateTextInput(String game, String[] statements) throws RuntimeException
      Validates the given text input for the given puzzle
      Parameters:
      game - the name of the puzzle
      statements - an array of statements
      Returns:
      true if it is possible to create a board for the given game with the given statements, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if any of the input is invalid
